Privacy Policy

1. Introduction

Welcome to CambodiaTrade.com ("Company", "we", "our", "us")!

These Terms and Conditions of Service ("Term", "Term of Service") govern your use of website, mobile site located at Cambodiatrade.come and it's mobile applications (together or invidually "Service") operated by Cambodiatrade.com or it's affiliates (individually or collective as "CambodiaTrade"). CambodiaTrade provides great feature and Cambodia-made products and service when you visit or show from the CambodiaTrade.com and/or it's mobile applications. By using CambodiaTrade products or services, you agree to the Term of Service. Your agreement with us includes these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy ("Agreements"). You acknowledge that you have read and understood the Agreements and agree to be bound by them. Our Privacy Policy also govern your use our Service and explains how we collect, use, and disclose imformation that results from you use of our service.

These Term apply to all visitors, users and other who wish to access or use Service.

2. Definitions

If yor wish to purchase any product or service made available through our Service ("Purchase"), you may be ask to supply certain information relevant to your Purchase including but not limited to, your valid shipping information.

We may employ the use of third party services for the purpose of facilitating payment and the completion of the Purchase. you are cautioned to read such third party service' Term and Conditions and/or Privacy Policies before using third party services, You acknowledge that CambodiaTrade has no control over such third party services, does not monitor such third party services, and shall not be responsible or liable to anyone for such third party services, or any content, products or services made avaiable on or through to these third party services. By submitting you information, you grand us the right to provide the information to these thrid parties subject to our Privacy Policy.

Any purchase made using our Service forms contactual obligatiobs between you as buyer other users as sellers. We shall not be a party to contract and thus are not liable to any issues arising from the contract, although these Terms shall be observed, where applicable.
